summary: PURCHASED A NEW 2016 ULTRA CLASSIC HARLEY DAVIDSON NOW HAS 9200 MILE THE COMPENSATOR STARTED TO RATTLE BEFORE I WAS ABLE TO MAKE IT HOME THE COMPENSATOR WENT COMPLETELY WHILE DRIVING ON HIGHWAY
ELECTRICAL SYSTEM MALFUNCTION.  SCREEN FOR GPS AND RADIO STOPPED WORKING

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 HARLEY-DAVIDSON ROAD GLIDE FLHTCU EQUIPPED WITH SHINKO 77HD (NA) TIRES, SIZE: 180/65/B16 (NA). WHILE DRIVING BETWEEN 70-80 MPH, THE REAR TIRE SUDDENLY EXPERIENCED SEVERE VIBRATION AND WOBBLING. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE AND THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE COMPANY WAS AWARE OF THE ISSUE WITH THE TIRES. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE CONTACT WAS ADVISED TO RETURN ALL REMAINING INVENTORY TO THE MANUFACTURER. THE CONTACT INDICATED THAT THE FAILURE ONLY OCCURRED ON TIRES WITH THE SAFETY SIDEWALLS. THE VIN AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE UNKNOWN.

SCENARIO:  2016 ULTRA 4200 MILES  THAT I PURCHASED WITH ZERO MILES FROM THE DEALER.  IT HAS ALWAYS BEEN SERVICED BY THE DEALER AS WELL.      THE BRAKES WERE FINE.  I PARKED AT A RESTAURANT AND WHEN I CAME BACK OUTSIDE I PULLED UP TO THE STREET AND HAD BRAKES.  I PULLED OUT ONTO THE STREET AND I HAD NO BRAKES WHATSOEVER ON MY BACK BRAKES AND MY FRONT BRAKES WERE DOING SOME KIND OF GRABBY ON OFF THING AT 10MPH.  IT WAS SCARY AS HELL, NO BACK BRAKES AND ALMOST NO FRONT BRAKES.  THE BACK BRAKES JUST WENT DOWN ALL OF THE WAY.    I HAD TO TRAILER THE BIKE 90 MILES BACK TO TULSA.  MY BIKE  IS IN THE SHOP AND THEY ARE SAYING IT IS THE ABS CONTROL UNIT.  I WAS COMPLETELY UNAWARE THAT A FAILURE OF THE ABS IN THIS FASHION COULD RESULT IN BASICALLY A TOTAL LOSS OF BRAKES.  ABS LIGHT WAS OFF AS WELL, BUT THERE WAS A CODE ON THE BIKE.    HONESTLY I'M PISSED BECAUSE IT COULD HAVE HAPPENED DURING MY RIDE AND IT WOULD HAVE JUST BEEN ANOTHER BIKER WHO RUNS OFF THE ROAD AND KILLED HIMSELF, ETC AND NOBODY WOULD BE THE WISER.    THERE IS NO REASON FOR KIND OF TOTAL FAILURE.  IT'S UNACCEPTABLE.  FAILING BACK TO STANDARD BRAKES IMMEDIATELY IS MUCH BETTER THAN NO BRAKES.      ---HARLEY FIXED THE BRAKES AT NO CHARGE, BUT I FEEL THEY ARE AWARE OF THE ISSUE AS I'VE READ OF OTHERS WITH SIMILAR ACCOUNTS.  THEY REPLACED THE ABS CONTROL UNIT, WHEEL SPEED SENSOR, AND WHEEL BALL BEARING.

THE HEADLIGHTS AT NIGHT ONLY LIGHTS UP THE ROAD ABOUT 15 FEET IN FRONT OF YOU GOING AROUND TURNS IN THE ROAD AND CURVES. YOU ARE DRIVING IN TOTAL DARKNESS UNTIL THE MOTORCYCLE IS STRAIGHTEN OUT. AND THE HIGH BEAM ONLY LIGHTS UP A SMALL CIRCLE IN FRONT OF YOU GOING DOWN THE HIGHWAY. YOU CAN'T SEE THE SIDE OF THE ROAD IN CASE AN ANIMAL IS COMING ONTO THE HIGHWAY. THIS IS A VERY UNSAFE LIGHTING SYSTEM HARLY HAS INSTALLED ON THE MOTORCYCLE IN 2016. THEY ARE CALLED DAY MAKERS. BECAUSE THEY ARE ONLY DESIGNED TO DRIVE IN THE DAYTIME.
